Schedule and Booking

Below are links to book sessions for each subject, please select the type of session below to select avaible times. You can book multiple sessions in advance, however, a cancellation within 24 hours or a missed session will result in a $50 fee:

  • Mathematics
  • Algebra I
  • Algebra II
  • Geometry
  • AP Calculus AB and/or Calculus I
  • AP Calculus BC and/or Calculus II
  • Multivariable Calculus
  • Ordinary Differential Equations
  • Linear Algebra
  • SAT Mathematics
  • ACT Mathematics
  • PERT Exam Mathematics
  • Foudational Sciences
  • High School Level Chemistry
  • AP Chemistry and/or General Chemistry I/II
  • High School Level Physics
  • AP Physics I: Mechanics and/or Physics I
  • AP Physics II: Mechanics and/or Physics II
  • Organic Chemistry I/II

Payment is accepted in the form of Venmo, CashApp, and Zelle. Below are links and QR codes for each method. Payment should be made in advance of the session and will be verified every month. If payment has not been completed by the end of the month, sessions will not be approved until the prior month's financial obligation has been met. I will send email/notification at the end of the month if payment has not been sent. If you have If you would like to confirm your balance, please do not hesitate to contact me at jrosenfeld.services@gmail.com or text/call at 786-457-5675.
